text: Kintu dushman ke morom koribi aru bhal kaam to dikhai dibi, aru bodli te kiba pabo nimite bhabona nokoribi, eneka korile, tumi laga inam to dangor thakibo, aru tumi Sobse Mohan laga bacha khan hobo, kele koile paapi khan kun Isor ke dhanyavad nadiya, Tai pora eitu khan sobke morom kore6.35 Lev. 25:35-36; Mat. 5:44-45.
